headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Wire Fraud in $1 Million Miami Heat Ticket Scam
headline.main: Man Charged With Wire Fraud in $1 Million Miami Heat Ticket Scam

docs.snippet: A Miami man has been charged with wire fraud in connection with a scam that yielded millions of dollars from investors and a premium ticket package for the Miami Heat NBA basketball team, prosecutors said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Miami man has been charged with wire fraud in connection with a scam that yielded millions of dollars from investors and a premium ticket package for the Miami Heat NBA basketball team, prosecutors said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: New Hampshire Men Sentenced as Teens to Life in Prison Granted New Hearings
headline.main: New Hampshire Men Sentenced as Teens to Life in Prison Granted New Hearings

docs.snippet: New Hampshire's highest court has ruled that four men serving life in prison for murders committed when they were teenagers have the right to new sentencing hearings because of a 2012 U.S. Supreme Court decision....
docs.lead_paragraph: New Hampshire's highest court has ruled that four men serving life in prison for murders committed when they were teenagers have the right to new sentencing hearings because of a 2012 U.S. Supreme Court decision.

headline.main: Hammerstein Festival Seeks to Inspire Great Lyrics

docs.snippet: The Oscar Hammerstein Festival at the Bucks County Playhouse wants to encourage lyricists to engage with sophistication and wit....
docs.abstract: The Oscar Hammerstein Festival at the Bucks County Playhouse wants to encourage lyricists to engage with sophistication and wit.

headline.print_headline: Judge Denies Special Prosecutor Request in Rampage
headline.main: Judge Denies Special Prosecutor Request in Rampage

docs.snippet: The judge in the Colorado theater shooting case has denied a defense request for a special prosecutor to look into a news story about defendant James Holmes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The judge in the Colorado theater shooting case has denied a defense request for a special prosecutor to look into a news story about defendant James Holmes.

headline.print_headline: Pentagon: Iraq Operations Cost $560 Million So Far
headline.main: Pentagon: Iraq Operations Cost $560 Million So Far

docs.snippet: U.S. military operations in Iraq, including airstrikes and surveillance flights, have cost about $560 million since mid-June, the Pentagon said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. military operations in Iraq, including airstrikes and surveillance flights, have cost about $560 million since mid-June, the Pentagon said Friday.

headline.print_headline: Experimental Ebola Drug Heals All Monkeys in Study
headline.main: Experimental Ebola Drug Heals All Monkeys in Study

docs.snippet: An experimental Ebola drug healed all 18 monkeys infected with the deadly virus in a study, boosting hopes that the treatment might help fight the outbreak raging through West Africa — once more of it can be made....
docs.lead_paragraph: An experimental Ebola drug healed all 18 monkeys infected with the deadly virus in a study, boosting hopes that the treatment might help fight the outbreak raging through West Africa — once more of it can be made.

headline.print_headline: After Deaths, NYC Music Festival Tightens Security
headline.main: After Deaths, NYC Music Festival Tightens Security

docs.snippet: Drug-sniffing dogs, peers watching for people feeling ill, a "cooling tunnel" and shorter days are greeting fans this weekend at an electronic music festival where two people died of drug overdoses last year, organizers said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Drug-sniffing dogs, peers watching for people feeling ill, a "cooling tunnel" and shorter days are greeting fans this weekend at an electronic music festival where two people died of drug overdoses last year, organizers said Friday.

headline.print_headline: Dutch Prosecutor in Ukraine for Crash Inquiry
headline.main: Dutch Prosecutor in Ukraine for Crash Inquiry

docs.snippet: The Netherlands has assigned a prosecutor to work in Kiev on the criminal investigation into the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Netherlands has assigned a prosecutor to work in Kiev on the criminal investigation into the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17.

headline.print_headline: Poland, Ukraine Bar Overflight by Russian Defense Minister's Plane
headline.main: Poland, Ukraine Bar Overflight by Russian Defense Minister's Plane

docs.snippet: Poland and Ukraine refused permission for a plane carrying Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu to use their airspace on Friday while returning home from a visit to Slovakia....
docs.lead_paragraph: Poland and Ukraine refused permission for a plane carrying Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu to use their airspace on Friday while returning home from a visit to Slovakia.

headline.print_headline: EU's Barroso Condemns Russian Incursion in Call With Putin
headline.main: EU's Barroso Condemns Russian Incursion in Call With Putin

docs.snippet: European Commission President Jose Manuel Barroso condemned "significant incursions" by Russian forces into Ukraine in a phone call with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Friday, the EU said....
docs.lead_paragraph: European Commission President Jose Manuel Barroso condemned "significant incursions" by Russian forces into Ukraine in a phone call with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Friday, the EU said.
